description: Lists all tags on a directory.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: of the directory for which you want to retrieve tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: List of tags returned by the ListTagsForResource operation.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Required name of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@'(Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').
